definition: to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: Now that the exam is near, the students are really going at their studies.
sentences.chinese: 考期臨近了，所以學生們確實在刻苦鑽研。

sentences.english: Near examination time, some of the students fish for information about the examination questions.
sentences.chinese: 考期臨近，一些學生想打聽考試內容。

sentences.english: I want to ask you about the examination .
sentences.chinese: 考期臨近，一些學生想打聽考試內容。

definition: entrance exam for senior middle school
autumn exam (triennial provincial exam during Ming and Qing)
metropolitan civil service examination (held triennially in spring in imperial times)/Crown Prince's chambers/by extension, the Crown Prince

college entrance exam (especially as abbr. for 普通高等學校招生全國統一考試|普通高等学校招生全国统一考试[Pu3 tong1 Gao1 deng3 Xue2 xiao4 Zhao1 sheng1 Quan2 guo2 Tong3 yi1 Kao3 shi4])/(Tw) entrance exam for senior government service posts (abbr. for 公務人員高等考試|公务人员高等考试)
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
